mapper.insert: insert into lagarto.auction (icategory, title, ctnt, iuser, buy, imbuy, image1, image2, image3, image4, image5,buyer) values (#{icategory}, #{title}, #{ctnt}, #{iuser}, #{buy}, #{imbuy}, #{image1}, #{image2}, #{image3}, #{image4}, #{image5},0)
mapper.select: select *, B.nm as writernm From lagarto.auction A Left join lagarto.lagarto_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser where A.isdel = 0 Order by A.iboard DESC LIMIT 1
select *, B.nm as writernm, B.nickname as nicknm From lagarto.auction A Left join lagarto.lagarto_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser where A.isdel = 0 and A.icategory = ${icategory} Order by A.iboard DESC
select *, B.nm as writernm, B.nickname as nicknm from lagarto.auction A left join lagarto.lagarto_user B on A.iuser = B.iuser where A.isdel = 0 order by A.rdt desc

SELECT *, B.nm as writernm , B.profile_img,B.nickname as nicknm , C.nm as categorynm, D.nickname AS buyernickname from lagarto.auction A left join lagarto.lagarto_user B on A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN lagarto.lagarto_user D ON A.buyer = D.iuser left join lagarto.auction_category C on A.icategory = C.icategory where A.iboard = #{iboard}
mapper.update: UPDATE lagarto.auction set title=#{title}, ctnt=#{ctnt}, imbuy = #{imbuy}, buy = #{buy}, image1 = #{image1}, image2 = #{image2}, image3 = #{image3}, image4 = #{image4}, image5 = #{image5} WHERE iboard = ${iboard} and iuser = ${iuser}
